src:
Turun di Moto2 2020, Andi Gilang Gantikan Dimas Ekky Pratama
06 Nov 2019, 09:37 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap muda asal Indonesia, Andi Farid Izdihar atau yang lebih dikenal dengan Andi Gilang, resmi akan turun penuh di Moto2 2020. Ia akan membela Idemitsu Honda Team Asia, menggantikan rider Indonesia lainnya, Dimas Ekky Pratama.
Turunnya Andi Gilang di Moto2 2020 diumumkan secara resmi pada Selasa (5/11/2019), bertepatan dengan Honda Racing Corporation (HRC) yang mengumumkan program balap mereka di ajang dunia 2020 dalam gelaran EICMA di Milan, Italia.
Rider 22 tahun ini pun akan bertandem dengan rider Thailand yang tahun ini tengah menjalani debut gemilang, Somkiat Chantra. Menurut rilis resmi Honda Team Asia, Gilang mendapatkan kesempatan ini berkat performa apiknya di FIM CEV Repsol Moto2.
text:
Down in Moto2 2020, Andi Gilang Replaces Dimas Ekky Pratama
Nov 6 2019, 09:37 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian young racer, Andi Farid Izdihar or better known as Andi Gilang, will officially go down in Moto2 2020. He will defend Idemitsu Honda Team Asia, replacing another Indonesian rider, Dimas Ekky Pratama.
The descent of Andi Gilang in Moto2 2020 was officially announced on Tuesday (11/5/2019), to coincide with the Honda Racing Corporation (HRC) which announced their racing program at the 2020 world event at the EICMA event in Milan, Italy.
This 22-year rider will compete with Thai riders who are undergoing a glorious debut this year, Somkiat Chantra. According to the official release of Honda Team Asia, Gilang got this opportunity thanks to his slick performance on the FIM CEV Repsol Moto2.
